Features:
Schedule out all your zero calorie fast and eating windows for the week and let the app timer run automatically with notifications telling you when to stop eating and when to start fasting.

What Is Intermittent Fasting?
What usually comes to mind when most people hear of Intermittent Fasting (IF), is that it is just another crazy fad diet to lose weight with little effort. However, it isn't a diet at all, but rather an eating pattern. It’s not what you eat, but when you eat it that is important.
Depending on what type of fasting you schedule, you generally will have a time window where you are allowed to eat all the food you want. As soon as that window is over though, you don't eat ANYTHING until the window comes up again. For example, a common approach is 16 hour fasts with an 8 hour eating window every day.
There are dozens of different type of fasting diets, and with MyFast you can utilize any plan such as:
16/8 - Lean Gains
5:2 - Eat normal for 5 days, and IF the remaining 2
20/4 – The Warriot Diet
24/0 – Full Day or Alternative Day Diet
Alternative Day Diet - (every other day you will be fasting for 24 hours.)
Any other zero calorie fasting plan you can think of is possible

summary.label:
“It's like having the world's best sake sommelier in the palm of your hands!”

Sakenomy is a sake sommelier app that gives you access to over 1300 sake breweries and information about tens of thousands of sake labels.
In addition to a wealth of information about how to enjoy sake and food pairings recommended by sake brewers, you can find answers to questions such as "What does this sake taste like?", "What is the best food pairing for this sake?, and "Which sake is recommended for specific cuisines? 
Sakenomy will also remember the sake you have tasted, and provide suggestions of other sake that you may wish to try.

Get your own personal sake sommelier today!


■Sakenomy's Commitment■

1.  A wealth of sake information direct from the breweries
You can access first-hand information about breweries and sake that is directly updated by sake breweries from all over Japan. You can also find recommendations on the best food pairings for each sake, as well as suggestions on the ideal glassware, sakeware, and serving temperature to optimise the enjoyment of your sake.

Sakenomy is full of information for "sake beginners" who are interested in sake, but don't know what or how to choose a sake that suits their preferences. It is also a valuable reference for sommeliers and food and beverage industry professionals. 

The "Search by Pairing" function makes it easy to find the ideal sake for a particular cuisine. For example, within Japanese cuisine, there are 16 different categories (sushi, kaiseki and tempura, etc...) from which you can search for the best pairing. Sake brewers also share the dishes they personally recommend for pairing with their sake, so you are sure to find the perfect sake to suit any restaurant's menu.
 
In addition to detailed information about each sake, you can also find brewers' recommendations on how to enjoy it (ex: the best serving temperature, sakeware) and reviews from other users. 
Finding a sake you like has never been easier!

When you discover a sake that you like, you can easily make a note of your tasting comments, the temperature at which you drank it, and upload a photo of the bottle. Recording the restaurant and date that you enjoyed each sake will ensure you'll never forget your favourites! 
Sakenomy will also suggest sake with similar characteristics, so that you can discover other sake that suits your preferences!


2.  Buy your favourite sake with just one click!
Sakenomy is linked to the online "Sakenomy Shop", so you can buy your favourite sake with just one click. Sakenomy Shop solves the problem of not knowing where to buy your favourite sake! [Within Japan only]

What's more, Sakenomy Shop is dedicated to ensuring you enjoy sake in its optimum condition, so all of our products are sent directly from sake breweries throughout Japan by refrigerated delivery! Because the sake is delivered straight from the brewery to your door, you can enjoy the genuine quality and wonderful flavour that the brewer intended. [Within Japan only]


3.  A travel guide that helps you to discover local regions of Japan. 
Sake is produced in all 47 prefectures of Japan, and most are located in remote areas that are not well documented in travel guides. As sake breweries have often been in business for hundreds of years, and have deep connections within the community, their local knowledge and recommendations of where to eat, drink, stay and explore are truly the best.

In Sakenomy, brewers provide you with their recommendations on the best local restaurants and inns, as well as the best gourmet food to go with their sake.

Sakenomy is also an invaluable guide for exploring Japan and enjoying local cuisine.
It's a must-have for sake lovers and travel enthusiasts alike!

■Notes on the use of the application
Please use this application in a good network environment.

im:name.label: 日本料理－味觉与视觉盛宴

summary.label:
日本料理即“和食”是成为日本的菜肴。主食以米饭、面条为主，因为靠近大海所以副食多为新鲜鱼虾等海产，常配以日本酒。和食以清淡著称，烹调时尽量保持材料本身的原味。
在日本料理的制作上，要求材料新鲜，切割讲究，摆放艺术化，注重“色、香、味、器”四者的和谐统一，尤其是不仅重视味觉，而且很重视视觉享受。和食要求色自然、味鲜美、形多样、器精良。而且，材料和调理法重视用餐环境的搭配的意境。
听完这些介绍，想必更多美眉们更爱日本料理了吧，日本各种花样美味寿司，三文鱼，烤鱼，日式便当，日式面食等等。别担心，为了您的味蕾和情调，我们特别给您精挑细选了易做好吃的日本料理哦，赶紧动手试试吧！
